Text:
[II] Let us invoke Christ, with the joy and gladness of all who wait for him:
[IR] Come, Lord, do not delay.
[I1] Eagerly, we await your arrival,
[I2] come, Lord Jesus.
[I1] You who were before the ages,
[I2] come save us in our times.
[I1] You who created the cosmos and all who dwell in it,
[I2] come redeem the work of your hands.
[I1] You didn't despise our mortal nature,
[I2] come snatch us away from the empire of death.
[I1] You came that we might have lives beyond abundance,
[I2] come give us your eternal life.
[I1] You wished to unite all people into your Kingdom,
[I2] come gather all who long to see you face to face.
Changes: 2022-12-05 - Paul Prins: Initial translation of these intentions.
